name: Contra-Positive (Post Jam)
description:
Contra-Positive was originally made for the 2-colors-game-jam in around 8 hours and was my very first Game Jam entry ever (whoo!). You can find the jam version here. Because of these time restrictions, I felt that it needed some extra love after the jam release and so started hoovering up bugs and polishing it right away until I reached a point where I felt it was feature complete enough to mark a v1.0 release.

I may come back to this game in the future to add better scoreboard support, new game-modes etc however for now it remains a quick and simple complete game.
